text: The provisions of ยง 664 of Title 18, United States Code (relating to theft or embezzlement from employee benefit plans), shall apply to the Trust Fund and the Federal Supplemental Fund.

heading.catch_text: Treatment of misappropriation of fund amounts as Federal crime.
